DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study High-Dose Cyclophosphamide Patients With Severe Autoimmune Hematologic Disease
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive high-dose cyclophosphamide IV day 1-4 filgrastim ( G-CSF ) start day 10 continue blood count recover . Patients follow 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month annually thereafter .
